bug.author: bionicles
bug.summary: GPU docs don't show how to test your install
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/install/gpu>https://www.tensorflow.org/install/gpu</denchmark-link>
how do you test your install to make sure everything went OK?

comments.comment:
Hi, You can follow the guides from here: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/using_gpu>TF 1.x</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/beta/guide/using_gpu>TF 2.x</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://stackoverflow.com/questions/38009682/how-to-tell-if-tensorflow-is-using-gpu-acceleration-from-inside-python-shell>stack overflow</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/bionicles>@bionicles</denchmark-link> : Have a look on @shaolinkhoa's suggestion and let us know if that resolves the issue. Thanks!
Automatically closing due to lack of recent activity. Please update the issue when new information becomes available, and we will reopen the issue. Thanks!
